title: New variational arguments regarding the Blaschke-Lebesgue theorem
abstract:
The sensitivity of the areas of Reuleaux polygons and disk polygons is
computed with respect to vertex perturbations. Computations are completed for
both constrained and Lagrangian formulations and they imply that the only
critical Reuleaux polygons for the area functional are the regular ones. As a
consequence, new variational proofs for the Blaschke-Lebesgue and Firey-Sallee
theorems are found.
